description: Create autonomous /complete-workorder slash command that implements plan.json tasks and handles all post-implementation steps
goal: Enable fully autonomous feature implementation from plan.json through to archive, eliminating manual implementation steps
requirements: Update TodoWrite task status as tasks complete
Handle errors according to plan.json guidance
Call update_deliverables to capture git metrics
Display progress and final summary to user
constraints: Must work with existing plan.json format
Must handle both simple and complex features
Git commits after each task with meaningful messages
Error handling must follow plan's risk assessment guidance
out_of_scope: Custom test framework integration beyond pytest/jest
acceptance_criteria: Command reads plan.json and implements all tasks
Deliverables, docs, and archive complete automatically
Works for features of varying complexity
